title: 109_s3683
content: Vests in the United States all right, title, and interest to, and the right to immediate possession of, Mt. Soledad Veterans Memorial in San Diego, California, to provide for its preservation as a national war memorial honoring veterans. Requires the United States to pay a negotiated or court-ordered amount of compensation to current owners of such property. Prohibits expanding the Memorial's boundaries, upon acquisition by the United States.
